General.Name: Xin Hee Co Ltd
General.Description: Xin Hee Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and processing of knitwear and clothing. Its products include footwear, hats, gloves, bags, fur leather, glasses, accessories, and crocheted products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

0.Name: Ms. Yue  Yang
0.Title: Employee Supervisor & JORYA Brand Design Director
